Class SocketClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.socket.SocketClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SocketClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterface
    This is the Socket Network implementation
    Author:
    Francesco Masciulli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SocketClient(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String serverIPAddress)
      Set username, server and client IpAddress and port; try to reach the server

      this method update the username after a modification request
      void connectClient()
      ClientInterface method implementation: this method handle the lookup and the creation of the client RemoteRegistry calling the method on the server to add the Remote reference to this last created registry;

        public void connectClient()
                   throws java.net.ConnectException
